LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.0.label: A cold piece of Mechanical prosthesis
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.1.label: Two cold piece of Mechanical prosthesis
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.1.descript: Well... I prefer cool mechanical ears.
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.2.label: THREE cold piece of Mechanical prosthesis
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.2.descript: Don't give me that weird tentacle thing!
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.3.label: FOUR! cold piece of Mechanical prosthesis!!
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.3.descript: I'M ALREADY SICK! I'm warning you!
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.4.label: I'M NOT FURRY!!!
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.4.descript: My limbs are cold machines! Kill me! AND SWITCH IT BACK!
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.5.label: <color=#7f0000>RoB-F-O-X</color>
LanguageData.AF_TH_HasAddedBodyPart.stages.5.descript: Our biology and engineering allow us to create real life, \nAnd you give me a 2077 steel knot??? \nD-I-E！！！！！！！
